name: cermont-atg
description: Sistema integral de gestión de órdenes de trabajo ATG - Cermont

scripts.dev:backend: npm --workspace backend run preflight && npm --workspace backend run dev:raw
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix "[{name}]" --kill-others-on-exit -- "npm --workspace backend run start" "npm --workspace frontend run start"
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.format: npm run format -w backend && npm run format -w frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w backend && npm run clean -w frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start

author: Cermont SAS
